Posts.Content: May 13, 2009 04:14PM joetta wrote: Jus to let you know that I had infiltrating ductal carcinoma 16 years okay.  There is life after diagnosis and treatment.  Sometimes we don't like the treatments we have to endure, however, look at it as an insurance policy.
Posts.Title: For my Mom aka Superwoman Nicole_Bronx Nicole_Bronx
